message.content: Now let me check the update_feed_url function to see where the magic number 10 is used:

content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   890	        except Exception as update_e:
   891	            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation

   893	        
   894	        logger.info(f"Updated feed {feed_id} from '{original_url}' to '{new_url}'.")

   898	        # Include only recent feed items in the response (limit to 10)
   899	        feed_data['items'] = [item.to_dict() for item in feed.items.order_by(FeedItem.published_time.desc()).limit(10)]
   900	        return jsonify(feed_data), 200 # OK
